item.title: Sahaniza add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Perang, kekuasaan, kekayaan, seperti unggun api dalam kegelapan dan orang berterbangan untuk mati tumpas di dalamnya." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Sahaniza add a quote by G. Willow Wilson
item.description: "to do the right thing you must sometimes defend people who don't understand you, or who fear you, or who are angry at you. There are times when you have to operate purely on faith and continue to trust human decency even when it is no longer visible." -- G. Willow Wilson

item.title: Sahaniza add a quote by Mosyuki Borhan
item.description:
"Katakan saja Kau cinta aku dalam diam
Bisa saja aku cinta kau dalam dalam." -- Mosyuki Borhan

item.title: Sahaniza add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Semua taktik yang merugikan diri sendiri itu, jika boleh disebut dengan satu kata, itulah cinta." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Sahaniza add a quote by Ruth Ozeki
item.description: "Am I crazy?" she asked. "I feel like I am sometimes." "Maybe," he said, rubbing her forehead. "But don't worry about it. You need to be a little bit crazy. Crazy is the price you pay for having an imagination. It's your superpower. Tapping into the dream. It's a good thing not a bad thing." -- Ruth Ozeki

item.title: Sahaniza add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sahaniza add a quote by Jamie Craig
item.description: "That moment when you finish a book, look around, and realize that everyone is just carrying on with their lives as though you didn't just experience emotional trauma at the hands of a paperback." -- Jamie Craig
